public class Trader
extends User

  • Method Details

    • viewOrders

      public void viewOrders()
      Prints all the orders of this trader.

    • seeProducts

      public void seeProducts()
      Prints all the products of this trader.

    • setOrderStatus

      public void setOrderStatus​(java.lang.String orderID, int mode)
      Sets the status of the order with given order ID.
      Parameters:
      orderID - ID of the order
      mode - determines the status of the order(1 is met, 2 is cancelled)

    • addProduct

      public void addProduct​(java.lang.String productName, java.lang.String productCategory, java.lang.String productPrice, java.lang.String productDiscountedPrice, java.lang.String productDescription)
      Adds new product to products.txt
      Parameters:
      productName - name of the product
      productCategory - category of the product
      productPrice - price of the product
      productDiscountedPrice - discounted price of the product
      productDescription - description of the product

    • removeProduct

      public void removeProduct​(java.lang.String ID)
      Removes the product with given ID.
      Parameters:
      ID - ID of the product
      Throws:
      java.util.NoSuchElementException - if there is no product with given ID

    • editProduct

      public void editProduct​(java.lang.String ID, java.lang.String newData, int mode)
      Edits the product with given ID.
      Parameters:
      ID - ID of the product
      newData - new data
      mode - determines which attribute is going to be edited(1 for name, 2 for category, 3 for price, 4 for discounted price, 5 for description)
      Throws:
      java.util.NoSuchElementException - if there is no product with given ID
